website_summaries.verdict: One of the best middleground diving computers for people wanting something more than a budget watch.
pros: Offers a dive log of 36 hours or 50 dives
Watch features a straightforward control interface that minimizes the amount of buttons you have to press while diving
Automated features like the automatic dive mode keeps information displayed when needed the most
cons: Single button interface can be difficult to use quickly while diving

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift to myself. It met my ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to myself. It met my expectations and more. Some reviewers will see it from an experienced point of view. I am a rank amateur and am so enthralled by just being under water, that I do not want to worry about a lot of stuff. It is simple to operate and gives me what I wanted. It does so much more than I can use as a newby. I believe that it will last me for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T. Crane

customer_reviews.title: Many negatives, very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Here in 2019, I find it incredibly sad that this pretty device resorts to 1990s hieroglyphics in the settings. Nearly impossible to sort out what the information is. Absurd. And screen is not bright enough. Was shipped with a low battery. Does not immediately sense submersion.
customer_reviews.author: John Brian Moran

customer_reviews.title: Wear it with an additional tether
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a nice little computer. Easy to operate with the one button design, easy enough to read. However, the latch for the wrist strap is awful. It is a flimsy piece of plastic that is held together by a pin that does not stay put. If anyone sees a gray puck floating around the Atlantic Ocean please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great dive computer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because I was going scuba diving several times on a cruise for which I was not taking all my dive equipment. It was easy to use, recording the dive time, max depth, average depth, and remaining no stop decompression time, and no-fly time. It worked great for multiple dives.
customer_reviews.author: David Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for the price. Easy to navigate the menu once you learn the process.
customer_reviews.text: The menu is tedious, but once you learn the process it is not so bad. It is a very simple click-through process with "back" button options. We used them in the ocean and at a high altitude lake and they worked perfectly. Finding software can be difficult and you have to buy the separate adapter to download your dive data. I could not pass up the $150 price for a couple of young divers just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S Maddux

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but was not new! Was used!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but someone had used this "new" piece of equipment before me! I checked the logs in my Puck Pro after my first 2 dives in Sri Lanka and I expected to see only two dives, but instead saw 3 dives! The oldest dive had occurred somewhere with cold waters (18C) and was a deep technical dive (I'm not a technical diver). See attached pic of this unexplained dive from the log menu Not cool Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Abdul Karim

customer_reviews.title: Good customer support and the computer worked well thus far.
customer_reviews.text: I works perfectly. Easy to wear and easy to use. They should advertise that apps exist which allow it to be blue toothed to an IPod. Everything I read said it could not. We figured out how and it works. Diving in Truk Lagoon, Chuuk, Indonesia. Some of the dives are deep so a dependable dive computer is mandatory. This on works well, it just took me a little bit to familiarize myself with it.
customer_reviews.author: thom harvey

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Worked great , learn what the display is showing you before you go . The labels psi etc are too small to read when diving . For the money it’s worth it. I liked how it timed down my safety stops. Logged all my dives with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ken123

customer_reviews.title: Great started computer
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to read. I really like the safety stop counter (you get a big 3:00 countdown including seconds) One button is super simple for operation but obviously makes setting a bit confusing (you get used to it though) Setting for nitrox is a little confusing and it stays set for nitrox until you change it back to air. User-replaceable battery is a huge win.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Lipscy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. I find it a little cumbersome to change Nitrox mix every dive. Also the log recall on the device requires a lot of flipping through the menu because I couldn't write down the log items fast enough and the battery saver kept blanking out the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A starter
customer_reviews.text: We are new to diving and wanted a reliable dive watch that would not break the bank as we needed two. I liked the reviews on the Mares Puck and the options it has. When we received them I was able to download the instructions and set them up. We are looking forward to using them on a dive. I will update review then.
customer_reviews.author: Qadave

customer_reviews.title: Dive computer
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to read and navigate through the different settings comfortable to wear on my dry suit just wish the download cable was cheaper and came with computer otherwise great product I use mine for both air and nitrox.
customer_reviews.author: markr906

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. I spent a week in Honduras and the diver computer worked perfectly and was easy to use. I would suggest that you practice using the buttons before you leave--this is not so easy that you can learn it on the dive boat. I have one downside. I wish that the internal lumination were brighter for night diving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Basic Dive Computer
customer_reviews.text: I am new to scuba diving and wanted an entry level dive computer. So far this one has worked well. It was pretty easy to learn to use (just read all the instructions that come with it) and works great. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tapsy

customer_reviews.title: Greas Computer
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The gas settings can be easy changed while reviewing the dive data so watch to make sure you don't accidentally change the gas setting and then dive on that wrong setting.
customer_reviews.author: BeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for newbies
customer_reviews.text: Great dive computer. This is my first dive computer and it is very easy to use. Really liked the alerts, it alerts if you are ascending too fast and when you need to stop for your safety stop.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Grad

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware this product does not come with a warranty or instruction manual from this company
customer_reviews.author: robert clapham

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and set up. I purchased one for my son, then my daughter in law, and now for myself. Easy to read. Accurate. Absolutely worth purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Mistie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Price shop......
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Only disappointment was the price. The company charged more for the product on Amazon than they did on their own website. Little to late. However, the computer was excellent during my recent dives and I do not regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Txmedic27

customer_reviews.title: All you need!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought and that was for my girlfriend. I have about 60 dives with mine And so far it has performed well. The one button operation makes it less confusing and it gives you all the readout you need for diving.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple dive computer. It isn't air integrated but if you already have an integrated dive comp, I'd recommend this as your secondary - nothing fancy but it is idiot-proof, reliable, and good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe pow chaser

customer_reviews.title: super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: the watch is good to just cover the basics. it is EXTREMELY easy to use. all you have to do it put it on and jump in the water. it turns on a starts logging automatically.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Winn

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive dive computer.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived early which was great as I was on a deadline for a dive trip. Worked fine underwater but found the menu system annoyingly hard to navigate to the info desired. Also, the computer arrived with a nearly dead battery.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: For the value I found it to be the best on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Used on my padi advanced deep diver cert. I would not dive with out the watch. Especially if your diving for a few days and need to fly out. Very handy and readability under water is great. The alarm was very handy when ascending.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Readable, easy to use display
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably easy to use and figure out. Only downside noted after 6 dives is there are two mysterious extra dives on the log that cannot be deleted. Looking forward to opportunity to use it more. Easy to read and use underwater, even with gloves on.
customer_reviews.author: SRO

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for the prcie.
customer_reviews.text: Computer did not turn on automatically when you get into the water. You have to turn it on
customer_reviews.author: pargueraboatpr

customer_reviews.title: No manuals included
customer_reviews.text: No manuals included. We are leaving tomorrow to a dive trip. Useless
customer_reviews.author: The Berries

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very functional. have not had a computer in over 10 years. does more then expected and is quite small. did not care for the watch band. to hard to put on with 3-finger mitts. Nice backup or just a bottom time.
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: Worked awesome on my trip at cozumel
customer_reviews.text: Worked awesome on my trip at cozumel. I wore it so the face was on the bottom of my wrist instead of on top like a normal watch as it was easier for me to read but that I believe is a personal preference. I bout 2 o e for me and one for my wife and she lived it to especially at the price.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and a bit more comfortable than most dive computers. I have used this on 6 separate dives. It's my new favorite for basic dives.
customer_reviews.author: Shaine Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great dive computer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use computer with host of features. Dive log software is terrible and ridiculous cost for PC cable, but the dive computer is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Angel

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to read under water. What else do you need? A good fill and you are gtg.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a dead battery and no instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a dead battery and no instructions. Update: after tightenning the battery compartment with a coin, the computer turned on, for now. I'll check again tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: destornillador

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. computer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice.computer , I have a Uwatec it showed 30 % but it died on the way to my vacation and I have to send it in to replace the batteries., I bought this computer as a back up , and for the money its great I.will not spend onother $1000 for a fancy computer. This one has everything I need. And to change the batteries just use a nickle to unscrew the old ones and put new one in great and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Even though I ordered one puck and one ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Even though I ordered one puck and one puck pro, I got two puck pros with no additional costs. I appreciate the upgrade. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a entry to intermediate diver.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it so haven't had a chance to use it. I did go through the settings, modes and features and it seems to be very straight forward in what it will do. Simple interface. Once I actually get to use it I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: It worked well. We took it on a trip to the keys and worked on every dive.
customer_reviews.author: David Harder

customer_reviews.title: Works great, just wish it had worked when I received ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with a dead battery. Luckily my husband has a kit to change batteries and they are inexpensive. Works great, just wish it had worked when I received it. I did not request a return or assistance so cannot speak to how that would have been handled.
customer_reviews.author: william p schellhase

customer_reviews.title: Mares is great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a back up to my icon HD black. This thing is super easy to use. If my icon fails I have this and my cluster so I can continue diving. For less than 200 bucks, this is probably the best dive computer you could buy.
customer_reviews.author: sgbolt

customer_reviews.title: Basic, simple, durable.
customer_reviews.text: One button, you can't mess it up, great for EAN dives.
customer_reviews.author: Harissa

customer_reviews.title: great computer
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the white one and got the black and gray one but works great
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good first time dive watch.
customer_reviews.text: Like that it does everything a beginner diver needs. Dislike the one button. I thought that would make it easier to maneuver through the menu but it actually make it harder. Once watch is set up, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: It is too big. I returned the item for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Ferraz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as it was advertised, haven’t used it to dive yet.
customer_reviews.author: soup31314

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dive computer at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this new dive computer. It goes into dive mode when it senses water, then goes into ascent mode when it senses you going up, all without you doing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Used for scout scuba dive  trip
customer_reviews.text: Worked well and easy to use. My son took on scuba adventure with scouts. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just plain loved it. Got 2 when hubs and I finally did nitrox certification. Great price and so easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Allberry-Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Nice but bige
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised big size it's like laptops on ur hand But it's very nice product anyway I like it
customer_reviews.author: Hamed alfard

customer_reviews.title: great display
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and large display makes this a great computer for a beginner or an experienced diver!
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and functional
customer_reviews.text: Only used about 4 times, but so far meets my expectations. Easy to use and gives me all the information I'm looking for as a novice diver.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Butz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Once you get a handle on getting through the menu. This is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great item for scuba diving.
customer_reviews.text: This item Is perfect for beginners or pros, perfect for scuba diving. It has a easy to read display for diving. Easy function buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Dronet

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty simple to get the basics info like depth
customer_reviews.text: I'm not diving too often. Used the computer 3 times. It's pretty simple to get the basics info like depth, timer for safty stop at 5m, alert when going up or down too fast and such. Good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: or bar

customer_reviews.title: It is Okay but not a brand new one I think
customer_reviews.text: I thought it is a brand new one but it wasn’t. The seal was broken and I could see little scratch on watch. It is Okay with price but should comment on this condition.
customer_reviews.author: ByungYoon KIM

customer_reviews.title: So far so great
customer_reviews.text: Great lil computer. Got this as a back up but it is easier to read than my primary. Win!
customer_reviews.author: Paul H Lacey

customer_reviews.title: no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use provides much of the features a beginner diver such as I would need.
customer_reviews.author: MallSanta

customer_reviews.title: Nice dive computer.
customer_reviews.text: Nice dive computer. Easy to use. Provides all the basic functions for air and Nitrox. Hard to beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hack88

customer_reviews.title: Great watch especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch . I've used it on 5 dives so far and have really been impressed
customer_reviews.author: R.J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use; works really well
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dive computer for someone looking for something affordable. It works really well and is just really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Cappellini (capp_m@yahoo.com)

customer_reviews.title: no instructions
customer_reviews.text: works fine just had to look up instructions online no user manual.
customer_reviews.author: SarahTravis

customer_reviews.title: very intuitive and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: A very complete computer, very intuitive and easy to use. TKS everything was good
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, great screen and very good price range
customer_reviews.author: alejandro amaya

customer_reviews.title: Package was excellent and the computer works and the guide is
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, Package was excellent and the computer works and the guide is clear
customer_reviews.author: Diana Carvajal

customer_reviews.title: for diving works great. All the features I need
customer_reviews.text: Used it, for diving works great. All the features I need. No problems. Software for PC could be better.
customer_reviews.author: KBell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and reliable!
customer_reviews.text: It's an accurarate and reliable dive computer! I've used several times and it's an excellent computer!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto A.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use, display is brighter and info is easier to read compared to my Zoop
customer_reviews.author: A. Rodriguez Md

customer_reviews.title: Works okay -  but we were sent a used unit sold as new
customer_reviews.text: This is an entry level product so it doesn't have things like the a cool bluetooth link to your tank. The unit we received had display issues and the battery got low on the very first dive. A dive shop near our hotel opened it up - we were disappointed to discover it was full of muck from prior use. We were sold a used (not even refurbished) unit as new! Fortunately the dive shop cleaned out the muck and replaced the battery and it worked fine after that.
customer_reviews.author: NYC and Country Couple

customer_reviews.title: Great dive watch for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great dive watch for the price. Bought it as a gift for my husband. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Stuhltrager

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my computer! Pretty easy to use. It was a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what i bargained for. - Easy to use, even changing settings while already in water - Beep alarm is easily heard and not too sensitive - Back light was bright enough for a Cavern dive This is the cheapest dive computer I could find and it has everything I need and some. very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: SVYtech

customer_reviews.title: I'd choose something else
customer_reviews.text: Computer works ok, the single button interface is mediocre at best, display is not big/bright enough. There are better options for dive computers in this price range... i.e. Suunto Zoop
customer_reviews.author: Ido K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dive Computer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dive computer. Bouncing through the screens after the dive is done takes a little getting used to. The information on the main screen during your dive is easy to read. If it’s dark one push of the main button and the back light comes on. Definitely good for any level of diver that doesn’t want to pay extra for air integration.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cooper

customer_reviews.title: It seems very easy to use and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: It seems very easy to use and easy to read. My only concern is that it came with one "dive" already in its memory that is impossible to erase.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Kallend

customer_reviews.title: I like this dive computer
customer_reviews.text: I like this dive computer! It is great for a backup to the main dive computer I currently use. The seller delivered the package on time and the packaging was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really like the simplicity of this dive computer. It has the options I need for basic diving at both high altitude in lakes and in the ocean. I use it on weekend and extended trips. I have not had to replace the battery but try to follow directions as best as I can when things like that need to be done. There is also a useful online manual to help get used to this dive computer. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RayBey

customer_reviews.title: Great computer. SimpIIcity shines.
customer_reviews.text: Great dive computer. I find its simplicity and focus on a critical information is what makes this watch a great dive tool for the recreational diver.
customer_reviews.author: fjpsix

customer_reviews.title: This is a great dive computer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dive computer. Does everything you need for routine recreational diving. Used it in little cayman for first time and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bush

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good....haven't used it yet. Dive trip to Hawaii in April. Will review when return.
customer_reviews.author: bizjet5

product_meta.title: Mares Puck Pro Wrist Dive Computer for Scuba Diving
product_meta.description: Mares Puck Pro Wrist Top Dive Computer was introduced on the market in 2008 and sent a shockwave rippling through the industry with a super intuitive, easy to use, full-features RGBM nitrox computer at an extremely competitive price. INTUITIVE - One-button functionality simplifies operation. ACCESSIBLE - Large display and sleek design makes referrencing your guage easier than ever. VERSATILE - Upgradable firmware and multigas capability keeps this gauge relavant no matter how much time has passed.
feature_bullets: ACCESSIBLE - Large display and sleek design makes referrencing your guage easier than ever.
VERSATILE - Upgradable firmware and multigas capability keeps this gauge relavant no matter how much time has passed.
REAL WORLD APPLICATION - Residual nitrogen gauge and watch make this wrist top diving gauge versatile to use in sea or land.
